author: Special Correspondent
text:
The stage is set for the tussle of grey cells in the city with ‘The Hindu Young World Quiz 2016,’ the multi-city school quiz coming to Tiruchi on Thursday.

The 16{+t}{+h}edition of The Hindu Young World Quiz will be held at 2 p.m. on Thursday at MD Hall on the BHEL campus in the city. The popular contest will be hosted by quiz master V.V. Ramanan.

The event is open to students of standards VII to IX. Teams, comprising two members from a school, can take part in the contest by registering on the spot or by prior registration at The Hindu office, Chennai By-pass Road, Senthaneerpuram, Tiruchi - 4.

Spot registrations will be open from 12.30 p.m. on Thursday. The registration fee is Rs.200 per team. Any number of teams from a school can participate. The chief guest for the event will be G. Natarajan, Director, Postal Services, Central Region, Tamil Nadu. This year’s edition is sponsored by Vellore Institute of Technology. BHEL, Tiruchi, is the venue partner of the event. For more information, contact K.Venkatesan by dialling 9443180834.
title: Quiz contest tomorrow
